column53: Through the mesh filter, the refined particles delicately cover pores and uneven textures, creating a smooth and flawless blurred skin finish.A comfort matte texture suitable for all skin types and seasons, with a mild formula safe for sensitive skin.The triple-layered blending puff with excellent cushioning is designed exclusively for Blue Cushion, delivering the perfect harmony with matte textures for a flawless skin finish.

MFDS Evaluation of Functional Cosmetics N
Precautions when using 1. Consult a specialist if you have abnormal symptoms or side effects such as a skin rash, swelling, or itchiness during use or from exposure to direct sunlight after use.
2. Do not use on wounds or other affected areas.
3. Storage and handling instructions a) Keep out of reach of children. b) Keep away from direct sunlight.

column53: The innovative blurring pudding formula fills in lip wrinkles and smoothes them.From lips to cheeks, it beautifully colors with just one finger.The fluffy moisturizing pudding formula combined with blurring powder fills lips comfortably and blurs wrinkles and pores.

column2: freshian Egg Like Egg Like Cover Cushion (Vegan)
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Makeup > Face Makeup
column47: Smooth and cleanly peeled egg skin is achieved by applying a proprietary Egg-like skin technology.Contains more than 61% of moisturizing vegan conditioning ingredients for smooth and radiant skin, creates a healthy ivory tone suitable for Korean skin tone, and produces a comfortable cover-fit for the skin for a long time.Smooth and perfect coverage is possible without wrinkles, as it contains high-concealing powder.The moisturizing effect of skincare with a moist texture containing ceramide keeps the skin moisturized inside and smooth outside.

column2: DEAR DAHLIA Primer Layer Primer 40ml
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Makeup > Face Makeup
column47: #Glow PrimerThe light oil complex fixes to the skin, offering beautiful glowing skin for a long time.Contains glyceryl glucoside, which helps with fundamental skin moisture care and skin hydration.Contains allantoin and calming lily, which have soothing and brightening effects for sensitive skin.Contains Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, a patented ingredient of DEAR DAHLIA, which has antioxidant effects.Contains plant-derived oils that fill the skin healthily and smoothly.#Green Correcting PrimerWrinkle-like powder appropriately controls the skin's oil and moisture, maintaining fresh and smooth makeup for a long time.Contains Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract with the scent of bamboo and dew, which helps inhibit melanin synthesis and improve skin condition.Contains madecassoside and Centella Asiatica, which have skin-soothing and moisturizing effects.Contains Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, a patented ingredient of DEAR DAHLIA, which has antioxidant effects.Contains plant-derived oils that fill the skin healthily and smoothly.#Blurring PrimerContains glyceryl glucoside, which helps with fundamental skin moisture care and skin hydration.Contains Dahlia Variabilis Flower Extract, a patented ingredient of DEAR DAHLIA, which has antioxidant effects.Contains plant-derived oils that fill the skin healthily and smoothly.Contains aquasebum, a product containing Bombax Malabaricum Flower Extract for skin hydration and sebum control.
column52:
Content volume or weight Glow, Correcting Primer 40ml / Blurring Primer 35ml
Ideal for For all skin types
Expiration date (or expiration date after opening) 36 months after manufacturing date
How to Use [Glow, Correcting]
Gently shake before use. Apply an appropriate amount before foundation and smooth a thin layer onto the face with hands, a make-up blender or a brush, starting from the center of the face outwards.

[Blurring]
Apply an appropriate amount before foundation and smooth a thin layer onto the face with hands, a make-up blender or a brush, starting from the center of the face outwards. Apply a small amount to the bridge of your nose and other areas of concern.

column47: With 62% moisture essence content, this product delivers moisture particles and effective ingredients to the skin with each touch, leaving it with a refreshing moisture feel.Fixative Polymer forms a thin film on the skin by encapsulating active and moisturizing ingredients, preventing moisture loss, and giving skin a thin adherence like mine, allowing makeup to last for a long time.Contains active ingredients from iris for excellent moisturizing and skin protection.

column53: The pearl-like glow is applied perfectly on skin with SPF 50+ PA++++ formula.It is a product that has been loved a lot by providing beautiful texture as if not wearing makeup, with excellent adhesion and light use.This is the Semi-Glow finish cushion, which has a light and delicate infused texture that adheres to the skin and expresses a clear and soft pearl glow.

Precautions when using 1. Consult a specialist if you have abnormal symptoms or side effects such as a skin rash, swelling, or itchiness during use or from exposure to direct sunlight after use.
2. Do not use on wounds or other affected areas.
3. Cautions for Storage and Handling a) Keep out of reach of children. b) Keep away from direct sunlight.
4. If the content gets into your eyes, wash it off immediately.
Quality Assurance Standard Compensation for defective products is provided according to the criteria for the settlement of consumer disputes notified publicly by the Fair Trade Commission.

column47: The soft and supple gel base adheres to the eyelashes, allowing you to set the eyelash curler as if youâ€™ve curled it for the first time all day long.With an irreplaceable customized slim brush, it is possible to perfectly fix straight lashes even if they are drooping.The golden ratio of two soft and hard gel bases adheres thinly to each eyelash strand to maintain a perfect curling feeling all day long even on straight lashes.01 Long & Curl is a highly concentrated gel with minimal powder and 2mm fiber for a subtle and smooth look.02 Volume & Curl is made of high-adhering powder and silica with high oil absorption, allowing you to create a light and rich look.With two peptides, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1 and Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, and a triple black mix of black beans, black sesame seeds, and black rice, you can care for strong and clear eyelashes.

column47: [Serum]Contains albutin which helps with anti-pigmentation.Contains albutin that inhibits tyrosinase, which makes melanin pigments, to reduce pigmentation and remove fundamental cause of blemishes.Contains Bulgarian rose oil which is also called as liquid diamond to provide rich vitamins and solve complex skin concerns.Contains Rosa Damascena Flower Water for moisturizing and skin elasticity, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract for vitality, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract for vitality and skin protection, along with Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract for skin brightening, Centella Asiatica Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Sophora Flavescens Root Extract, and Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract for skin soothing, and White Willow Bark Extract to help with alleviating pores and dead skin cells.[Anti-blemish cream]Contains albutin, glutathione, and cell film extract for anti-blemish, scar control, and skin vitalization.Contains 5 kinds of hyaluronic acids, green ceramide, and Adansonia Digitata Leaf Extract for moisturizing soothing and skin protection.In addition to albutin as skin brightening ingredient, this product contains glutathione and cell film extract to make vitalizing and bright skin.5 kinds of hyaluronic acids in different sizes provide deep moisturizing to outer and inner skin, while green ceramide creates a moisture barrier to inhibit moisture loss.Contains Bulgarian rose oil which is also called as liquid diamond to provide rich vitamins and solve complex skin concerns.Contains centella asiatica and tea tree leaf extract for mild soothing of blemishes and scars without any irritation.

column47: A Symphony of Natural Ingredients for Pore PerfectionMoringa Purifying Pore Pads harness the power of nature's finest ingredients to deliver a comprehensive pore care solution. Let's delve into the magic behind each component:â€¢ Moringa Seed Extract: This powerhouse ingredient, present in a generous 388,000ppm, is a patented sebum control agent and an anti-pollution warrior. It effectively clears impurities and deeply cleanses pores, leaving the skin smooth and refreshed. Its wealth of amino acids and vitamins further boosts skin elasticity and hydration.â€¢ 7-Herbal Complex: A synergistic blend of fermented soybean, willow, cypress, and cinnamon extracts works wonders on the skin. This potent complex soothes irritations, provides lasting moisture, and regulates sebum production for a balanced complexion.â€¢ PHA & LHA: These gentle exfoliators gently remove dead skin cells, revealing a smoother, brighter, and more refined texture.â€¢ Hydration Heroes: Infused with 10 different moisturizing ingredients, including various hyaluronic acids, polyglutamic acid, ectoin, and panthenol, these pads deliver deep hydration that lasts. Your skin will feel plump, supple, and radiant.â€¢ Cooling Relief: Experience an instant cooling sensation with ingredients that instantly reduce skin temperature by 13.55%. This soothing effect is perfect for calming irritated skin and minimizing redness.â€¢ Eco-Conscious Choices: We believe in caring for both your skin and the planet. Moringa Pore Pads are certified vegan, OEKO-TEX, and biodegradable, ensuring you can enjoy their benefits with a clean conscience.This carefully curated blend of ingredients works in harmony to deliver exceptional pore care, leaving you with a clear, radiant, and healthy complexion.

How to Use For cleansing, apply an appropriate amount to your entire face and gently massage around when bubbles are generated. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water (Applicable either to wet or dry face)

How to use tip

01. 20-second cleansing in the morning! Apply an appropriate amount evenly to your face. In 20 seconds later when bubbles are generated, gently rinse.

02. 60-second cleansing in the evening! Apply an appropriate amount evenly to your face. In 60 seconds later when bubbles are generated enough, massage around and then rinse gently.

03. 5-minute deep cleansing pack! Before taking a shower, apply a thick layer of the formula to your face and let it rest for five minutes to have enough bubbles. Massage around and rinse gently.

How to use tip for man! Apply a thick layer of the formula on areas to shave instead of your shaving foam.

Please replace the cap with the included pumping nozzle for use.

Due to the nature of the formula, bubbles can be formed when exposed to air or in the pump during use as the formula meets oxygen in the air. It is only natural that you can use it with confidence.

Content volume or weight First Essence 165mL + Cream 50mL + Eye Cream 10mL + Mask Pack Sheet 1ea
Ideal for For all skin types
Expiration date (or expiration date after opening) 36 months (12 months after opening)
How to Use 1. Cream

In the final step of your skin care routine, spread an appropriate amount over your entire face.

2. First Essence

After cleansing, apply an appropriate amount, either by wiping up your skin with a cotton pad soaked in the formula or patting it on.

3. Eye Cream

Apply a pea-sized amount with your finger, from the inner corner of the eyes outwards, in gentle circular motions and tap it on your skin. Extend the application to the nasolabial folds around the mouth, forehead, neck and other parts prone to wrinkles.

4. Mask Pack Sheet

- 1. Wipe out your skin with tone and remove the film from the mask sheet.

- 2. Place the upper part of the mask sheet on your face, aligning the holes of sheet to your eyes.

- 3. Place the lower part of the mask sheet on your face, aligning the holes of the sheet to your nose and mouth.

- 4. Remove the sheet in 10-20 minutes and pat the remaining cream onto the skin.

column52:
Content volume or weight Cream 50mL+Ampoule 50mL+Mask Sheet 1P
Ideal for For all skin types
Expiration date (or expiration date after opening) 36 months before opening (Recommended to use it up within 12 months after opening)
How to Use 1. Cream
In the final step of your skin care routine, spread an appropriate amount over your entire face.
2. Ampule
After cleansing, apply an appropriate amount to your face and gently hold your face with both hands for better absorption.
Use it as the final step of your skincare routine and add sunscreen when used during the day to protect your skin from UV rays.
TIP
1) Use a moisturizer before and after using the ampoule to keep your skin comfortable.
2) Avoid using exfoliating or vitamin C-containing products together, as they can cause irritation.
3) Keep it closed after use to minimize contact with air, and store away from high temperatures and direct sunlight.
3. Mask Pack Sheet
[How to use]
1) After cleansing, prepare your skin with toner.
2) Take the sheet out from the package and place it evenly on your face. Gently stretch the band at the chin and pull up the cheeks and chin areas together.
3) Remove the mask after about 10-20 minutes, and lightly pat the remaining essence on the skin for absorption.
TIP. It's a dense formula that maximizes lifting effects. After removing the mask, follow up with Black Snail Cream for deeper nourishment.
